message: Let's be fair and reasonable, this is a good starting point
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic. Time is money, and inflation is eating at our potential gains. This is my counter-offer.
I see you're eager to make a deal, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. Inflation is affecting me less than you, so I'm willing to wait it out.
Alice, you're right, inflation is a factor. But every round that passes hurts us both. This offer is a compromise to close the deal quickly and avoid further losses for both of us.
